biotools.summary: CASTLE (Computational Analysis of SynThetic LEthals) is a collection of synthetic lethal data for various pathogenic organisms, generated computationally. Here, you can find synthetic lethal genes and reactions for more than 70 organisms.

bioschemas.name: CASTLE
